Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at 51st/Campbell
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 55th, Western and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/Campbell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 55th, Western and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/Campbell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier track switching problems near LaSalle. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier track switching problems near LaSalle.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
